refnamediv.refpurpose: A discrete user-defined-distribution random generator that can be used as a function.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: A discrete user-defined-distribution random generator that can be used as a function.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: itableNum -- number of table containing the random-distribution function. Such table is generated by the user. See GEN40, GEN41, and GEN42. The table length does not need to be a power of 2

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: ktableNum -- number of table containing the random-distribution function. Such table is generated by the user. See GEN40, GEN41, and GEN42. The table length does not need to be a power of 2
urd is the same opcode as duserrnd, but can be used in function fashion.

For a tutorial about random distribution histograms and functions see:
D. Lorrain. "A panoply of stochastic cannons". In C. Roads, ed. 1989. Music machine. Cambridge, Massachusetts: MIT press, pp. 351 - 379.
